author: Mitja Rutnik
title: BLU Life Max now available at Best Buy, just $80 until tomorrow
text:
The affordable BLU Life Max was officially announced back in November. You can now finally get the device in the US from Best Buy. The smartphone normally retails for $129.99, but BLU and Best Buy are kicking off the launch with a special offer. They are giving out a $50 discount to those who purchase the Life Max by Wednesday, January 18, at the latest. This means that if you hurry up, the device can be yours for only $79.99, which is quite a bargain.
The biggest selling point of the smartphone is probably its large 3,700 mAh battery. According to the manufacturer, it offers up to three days of average use on a single charge. The phone also features a 5.5-inch display with a resolution of 1280 x 720 pixels and is powered by the Mediatek MT6737 processor.
See also: The BLU Vivo XL2 drops by the FCC, launch imminent 3 weeks ago It comes with 2 GB of RAM, 16 GB of expandable storage, and a primary camera with an 8 MP sensor. Additionally, the device also sports a 5 MP selfie snapper, a rear-mounted fingerprint scanner, and dual-SIM capability. It ships with Android Marshmallow on board.
If you’re thinking of buying the latest smartphone from the Florida-based company, visit Best Buy by clicking the button below. And don’t forget that you have to place your order by tomorrow if you want to secure the $50 discount.
